jchain.util

Class BCUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.util.BCUtil

  • public class BCUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains both static and non-static (singleton) helper methods that provide useful functionality for the blockchain.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int bits(java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList)
      Gets the number of bits comprising all transactions in a collection.
      java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)
      Converts a byte array to a hexstring.
      java.lang.String doubleHash(java.lang.String value)
      Return a SHA-256 double hash of the indicated String.
      static BCUtil getInstance()
      Returns a singleton instance of the BCUtil class, useful for generating hashes.
      static double mint(int value)
      Takes a whole integer value and breaks it into a coin value.
      static int now()
      Gets the time using System.currentTimeMillis() as seconds.

      Returns a string padded to the specified width with the specified characters.
      int randRange(int max)
      Gets a random number within the range [0, max).

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static BCUtil getInstance()
        Returns a singleton instance of the BCUtil class, useful for generating hashes.
        Returns:
        BCUtil A singleton instance of the BCUtil class.

      • bits

        public static int bits(java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList)
        Gets the number of bits comprising all transactions in a collection. Note: It is possible that some dangling bytes get cut off from this calculation, but that is fine.
        Parameters:
        txList - A collection containing transactions.
        Returns:
        The number of bits across all transactions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the txList is null or empty.

      • bytesToHex

        public java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a byte array to a hexstring.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The byte array to convert.
        Returns:
        A hexstring representing bytes.

      • doubleHash

        public java.lang.String doubleHash(java.lang.String value)
        Return a SHA-256 double hash of the indicated String.
        Parameters:
        value - A string to double hash.
        Returns:
        A double SHA-256 hash as a hexstring.

      • mint

        public static double mint(int value)
                   throws IllegalOperationException
        Takes a whole integer value and breaks it into a coin value.
        Parameters:
        value - A value to mint coins from.
        Returns:
        A JCoin denomination that is 1/1000th of value.
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationException

      • now

        public static int now()
        Gets the time using System.currentTimeMillis() as seconds. Not a reliable time measurement.
        Returns:
        An approximate current time in seconds.

      • padString

        public static java.lang.String padString(int width,
                                         char fill,
                                         java.lang.String toPad)
        Returns a string padded to the specified width with the specified characters.
        Parameters:
        width - The width to pad the string to.
        fill - The character to pad the string with.
        toPad - The String to pad with characters.
        Returns:
        A String padded to the specified width with the specified characters.

      • randRange

        public int randRange(int max)
        Gets a random number within the range [0, max).
        Parameters:
        max - The maximum bound.
        Returns:
        A random number in the range [0, max).

      • randRange

        public int randRange(int min,
                     int max)
        Gets a random number within the range [min, max).
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum bound.
        max - The maximum bound.
        Returns:
        A random number in the range [min, max).
